Description: MIDNIGHT GRIND - AI Rival Driver Profiles

Rookie.Name: Kenny Matsuda
Rookie.Backstory: College student who just got into the scene. His dad used to race in the 90s and passed down his love for JDM. Still learning but has natural talent.

Quotes.PreRace: I've been practicing! Let's see what I've learned.
Quotes.PostWin: I can't believe I did it! My dad's gonna be so hyped!

Rookie.Name: Mira Chen
Rookie.Backstory: Saved up for months working at her parents' restaurant to buy her first car. What she lacks in experience, she makes up for in determination.

Quotes.PreRace: I'm just here to have fun and learn.
Quotes.Losing: That was smooth! Teach me that line!
Quotes.Winning: Oh my god, I'm actually ahead!
Quotes.PostWin: I need to tell everyone at the restaurant!

Rookie.Name: Travis Webb
Rookie.Backstory: Learned everything from YouTube tutorials. Talks a big game but still figuring out how to put the power down. His Stallion is louder than it is fast... for now.

Quotes.PreRace: I watched like 50 videos on racing lines. I got this.
Quotes.PostWin: Time to make my own channel!

Rookie.Name: Yuki Tanaka
Rookie.Backstory: Exchange student who grew up driving mountain roads in Japan. Her family owns a tofu shop. The memes write themselves, but she's legit skilled.

Quotes.PreRace: These roads remind me of home.
Quotes.PostWin: Maybe I should call my dad...

Street.Name: Marcus "Heavy Foot" Williams
Street.Backstory: Former drag strip regular who transitioned to street racing. His right foot knows only two positions: off and floor. Working on finesse, but raw power is his game.

Quotes.PreRace: Hope you like eating my exhaust.
Quotes.PostWin: That V8 sound never gets old.

Street.Name: Lisa Park
Street.Backstory: Graphic designer by day, street racer by night. Her Civic is a rolling art piece. Precise and calculated, she makes everything look effortless.

Quotes.PostWin: That's going on the mood board.

Street.Name: Jerome "J-Slide" Davis
Street.Backstory: Started drifting in parking lots as a teenager. Now he's one of the smoothest sideways pilots in the city. Racing isn't his main thing, but he'll still smoke you.

Quotes.PreRace: Grip racing? Aight, I'll play your game.
Quotes.Losing: You're fast, but can you slide?
Quotes.PostWin: Now let's do a real competition - drift battle.

Street.Name: Danny Reyes
Street.Backstory: Mechanic at his uncle's shop. Knows Honda engines inside and out. His turbocharged Civic is a pocket rocket that punches way above its weight class.

Quotes.PreRace: My uncle taught me everything. You're in trouble.
Quotes.PostWin: Family recipe for speed right there.

Street.Name: Alex Volkov
Street.Backstory: Grew up racing on frozen lakes back in Russia. Ice taught him car control that most will never understand. Cold, calculated, and dangerously smooth.

Quotes.PreRace: In Russia, we race in conditions you cannot imagine.
Quotes.PostWin: That was like warm-up on ice.

Pro.Name: Rachel "Rev" Morgan
Pro.Backstory: Former professional track day instructor who got tired of teaching. Now she's showing everyone what she learned. Her GTR is a surgical instrument.

Quotes.PreRace: Class is in session. Try to keep up.
Quotes.Winning: This is what years of practice looks like.
Quotes.PostWin: Another lesson delivered.

Pro.Name: Kenji Watanabe
Pro.Backstory: Former D1 driver who left Japan under mysterious circumstances. Rumor has it he was too fast and made the wrong people look bad. Now he drifts the American streets.

Quotes.PreRace: Show me what American streets have to offer.
Quotes.PostWin: This reminds me of Osaka nights.

Pro.Name: Mike "The Machine" Torres
Pro.Backstory: Ex-military, now works as a driving instructor. Known for never making mistakes and always running perfect lap times. His consistency is almost inhuman.

Quotes.PreRace: I've calculated every scenario. Let's execute.
Quotes.PostWin: Mission accomplished.

Pro.Name: Nina Castellanos
Pro.Backstory: She came from nothing and built everything herself. Her GTR started as a shell she found in a junkyard. Now it's a beast, just like her.

Quotes.PreRace: I didn't come here to be second.
Quotes.Losing: You got heart. I respect that.
Quotes.PostWin: From the junkyard to the winner's circle.

Pro.Name: Tyler Kim
Pro.Backstory: Software engineer who approaches racing like debugging code. He's optimized every millisecond of his lap times. Data-driven and frighteningly precise.

Quotes.PreRace: I've analyzed your runs. I know your weaknesses.
Quotes.PostWin: The data never lies.

Elite.Name: Dante "Ghost" Morales
Elite.Backstory: Nobody knows where he came from or where he goes after races. He appears, wins, and vanishes. Some say he's been racing these streets for decades. Others say he's a legend that never existed.

Quotes.PostWin: Until next time.

Elite.Name: Sakura Hayashi
Elite.Backstory: Daughter of a famous Japanese racing dynasty. Came to America to escape her family's shadow and forge her own legend. The Sakura GTR is named after her.

Quotes.PreRace: My family name means nothing here. Only skill matters.
Quotes.Winning: Cherry blossoms fall, but always return.
Quotes.PostWin: Father would be proud... I think.

Elite.Name: Vince "V12" Romano
Elite.Backstory: Old school racer who's been in the game since the 2000s. His Stallion has a swapped supercharged V12 that's louder than thunder. Respects tradition but isn't afraid to evolve.

Quotes.PreRace: You kids have no idea what real power feels like.
Quotes.Losing: Alright young blood, you got skills.
Quotes.PostWin: That's how we did it back in the day.

Elite.Name: Zara Okonkwo
Elite.Backstory: Sim racing champion who transitioned to real racing and dominated immediately. Some old-timers doubted her, until she left them in the dust. Now nobody questions her.

Quotes.PreRace: Sim or real, fast is fast.
Quotes.PostWin: Time to update my stream with this W.

Elite.Name: Jack "Hellcat" Henderson
Elite.Backstory: Built his reputation on pure American muscle. His supercharged Stallion puts down over 800hp. If the road is straight enough, nobody can touch him. Corners are... a work in progress.

Quotes.PreRace: Hope this track has some straights.
Quotes.Winning: All that matters is who crosses first!
Quotes.PostWin: 800 horsepower of freedom right there!

Legend.Name: Unknown
Legend.Backstory: The final boss of the underground. Nobody knows their identity, face always hidden. Some say Phoenix is actually multiple drivers sharing one identity. Others say they're a ghost of a racer who died on these streets decades ago. All anyone knows is: when Phoenix appears, records fall.

Quotes.PreRace: You've come far. Let's see if you're worthy.
Quotes.PostWin: Remember this feeling. Use it.

Special.UnlockCondition: Complete all Elite races with Gold

Legend.Name: The Three Kings
Legend.Description: Three legendary drivers who dominated the scene in the 2000s. They race as a unit, covering each other's weaknesses. Beating all three in a single race is considered impossible.
